title: The Desire to Kill
description:
Every man wants Si-ae. Her voluptuous figure and sultry stare make her irresistible, and she knows it. However, she’s put a life of lust behind her and tries her best to be content as a well-to-do housewife. That is, until Park Gijin comes back into her life. As the only man who managed to satiate Si-ae’s sexual urges, Gijin is the biggest threat to Si-ae’s cushy life. She knows that she needs to get rid of him, but she finds it harder and harder to resist the desire to…
[hr][*][url=https://www.lezhin.com/ja/comic/hatefull]Official Japanese Translation[/url]

matches.title: A Boy Who Will Become a Great Shimakaze-kun in Body and Soul in a Few Years
